Opening of the Fourth Seal (due by summer’s end 2002) and release of the Pale Horse is the point in Revelations when things begin to get really “ickey”—the rider named “Death” and the “Pit”/ Phantom Matrix/Wormhole Crew follow close behind. But until we come to understand “What the heck are these horses and horsemen anyway?” these revelations will have little rational meaning. It is vitally important to our collective planetary well-being that we finally comprehend the real meaning of the ''Four Horsemen of the Apocalypse,'' the ''Seven Seals'' and the ''Seven Angels with Seven Trumpets.'' Here follows the truth of what we will all move through during the next seven years of the SAC. REVELATIONS AND “SAINT JOHN THE DIVINE” In the Jehovian Annunaki falsification of original Essene scripture, there were numerous historical references to the “ Trumpets of God” and their powers to render the “Wrath of God” on behalf of the “righteous.” 16 As previously discussed, the Biblical “Trumpet” was an Atlantian ''code word'' for the sub-space Sonic-Mion-Field projection technology that has been used by the Jehovian Annunaki as a remote-range weapons system since pre-Atlantian days.
